content.text:
# Shooting at the 2018 Commonwealth Games – Queen's Prize pairs__disambig_1

The '''Queen's Prize pairs event took place on 9 and 10 April 2018 at the Belmont Shooting Centre in Brisbane. The winners were determined by the cumulative points each team had accrued over both days of competition.
Records
Prior to this competition, the existing Games record was as follows:
{|  class="wikitable"
|-
|Games record
|(David Luckman, Parag Patel)
|595-77v'''
|Glasgow, Scotland
|25–26 July 2014
|}
Schedule
The schedule was as follows:
{| class="wikitable"
! Date
! Time
! Round
|-
| Monday 9 April 2018 || 10:00 || Day 1
|-
|style=background:lemonchiffon| Tuesday 10 April 2018 || style=background:lemonchiffon| 10:00 ||style=background:lemonchiffon| Day 2
|}
All times are Australian Eastern Standard Time (UTC+10)
